WorkItem.Description:
I have associated XmlExplorer with xml files inside of Windows Explorer.  When I double-click a file to open, XmlExplorer opens as expected, however the document in empty.  If I minimize the XmlExplorer, and then restore it, the document is visible.
Â 
Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Issue opening file from Windows Explorer.

Comments.Message: I've noticed that happen as well.  I think it's a problem related to the docking panel suite I'm using.  I'll look into it.  By the way, this is not an issue with the new Alpha version 3 (because it doesn't use docking panels yet).
